item.title: Success Dance Definition (Open Question)
item.description:
Summary: Recurring open question: what does a ‘successful dance’ between Builder and Survivor look like operationally? Needs concrete definition and indicators.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 1–2

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
